meanings.definition: The act of rising from the dead.
meanings.sent1: The resurrections in the story brought the characters back to life.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the possibility of resurrections after death.
meanings.sent3: The resurrections in the movie made the audience gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening experienced a resurrections after she discovered a new plant species.
meanings.sent5: The resurrections in the legend were said to be accompanied by a bright light.

meanings.definition: A revival or renewal of something.
meanings.sent1: The resurrections of old traditions brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent2: The resurrections of interest in classic literature are evident in book sales.
meanings.sent3: The resurrections of retro fashion trends always make her smile.
meanings.sent4: The resurrections of forgotten songs can transport you back in time.
meanings.sent5: The resurrections of ancient recipes are now popular in modern restaurants.
